src:
Tumbang Lawan Bournemouth, Penyelesaian Akhir MU Jadi Sorotan
04 Nov 2019, 18:15 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Bek Manchester United, Harry Maguire memberikan tanggapan terkait kekalahan timnya melawan Bournemouth di akhir pekan kemarin. Maguire menilai timnya tumbang di laga itu karena mereka terlalu banyak membuang peluang.
Pada akhir pekan kemarin, Manchester United mengunjungi Vitality Stadium. Mereka menantang Bournemouth untuk pertandingan pekan ke 11 EPL musim ini.
Bertekad untuk melanjutkan momentum kemenangan beruntun mereka, United malah tersungkur. Mereka ditumbangkan 1-0 oleh tuan rumah berkat gol mantan pemain muda mereka, Joshua King.
Maguire mengakui bahwa timnya memang layak kalah di pertandingan tersebut. "Kami tidak bermain dengan buruk, namun kami kekurangan kualitas dalam permainan kami," buka Maguire kepada MUTV.

Baca komentar lengkap sang bek di bawah ini.
text:
Down with Bournemouth, Manchester United Final Settlement So Highlight
Nov 04 2019, 18:15 by Bola.net
Soccer - Manchester United defender Harry Maguire gave a response related to the defeat of his team against Bournemouth at the weekend. Maguire rate his team fell in that match because they wasted too many opportunities.
At the weekend, Manchester United visited the Vitality Stadium. They challenge Bournemouth for Week 11 of the EPL match this season.
Determined to continue the momentum of their winning streak, United instead fell down. They were overthrown 1-0 by the hosts thanks to the goals of their former young player, Joshua King.
Maguire admitted that his team was indeed worthy of losing the match. "We didn't play poorly, but we lacked quality in our game," Maguire told MUTV.

Read the full defender's comments below.
